title: NEW STUDIO FOR SALE IN DOWNTOWN PLAYA DEL CARMEN, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
RESIDENCE DESCRIPTIONThe universal force of the sum of the four elements, energy present in all living creatures. This development is the place where the senses awaken and the experience of life itself transcends.We inspire for the life of tomorrow.Creating spaces whose vision is focused on the well-being of those who inhabit them is a necessity in current and future daily life.The entire interior design is inspired by a biophilic concept, the origin of which lies in the connectivity of the occupants with the natural environment, through the use of direct nature (crosswinds, natural light) and indirect nature (sustainably manufactured furniture). Biophilic spaces that allow self-care, relaxation and contemplation, designed to enjoy tropical life and remote work.Located in the city of eternal vacations Playa del Carmen, the project has 23 apartments of 3 different types distributed over 6 levels. RESIDENCE AMENITIES- Terrace bar- Fire Pit & Grills- Solarium- Infinity Sky Pool- Jacuzzi- Reception- Gym- Elevator- Underground parking- 24/7 Security- Laundry- Outdoor cinema- Yoga area NEW STUDIO FOR SALE PLAYA DEL CARMEN PROPERTY DESCRIPTIONCharming studio apartments for sale from 41.42 m2 to 42.78 m2 in size, have a bedroom space with closet, 1 full bathroom, living room, kitchen with breakfast bar and a nice balcony with access from the bedroom.The apartment has large spaces and bright studios, designed for those people who work from home or for those looking to have a comfortable stay.All units are delivered fully furnished and equipped with everything you need to enjoy your investment from the moment it is delivered to you. PROPERTY AMENITIES- Closet- Balcony- Furnished- Air-conditioning  PLAYA DEL CARMENPlaya del Carmen is one of the fastest growing and booming cities in the region in the state of Quintana Roo, it offers world class facilities such as restaurants and shopping centers, it has some of the best bars and nightclubs just around the corner, so the nightlife is simply the best.In Playa del Carmen you can really enjoy yourself, so you can take a break from the busy life; If you want to enjoy nature and beautiful beaches, this city is one of the best places to live.In addition, it is a city that combines ancient Mayan culture, exuberant nature and impressive landscapes; Combined with the modernity of the city, they have consolidated Playa del Carmen as one of the best places to live and one of the best investments that can be made in Mexico. NEW STUDIO FOR SALE PLAYA DEL CARMEN

title: Sustainable Lush Condo in Aldea Zama, Tulum, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Exclusive apartments and a unique collection of amenities will set a new standard for tropical living on the Riviera Maya coast. A place to enrich the senses. An environment that combines diverse natural settings with the tropical activities that distinguish Tulum. A project made to experience the life you've always dreamed of.Where barefoot luxury meets the heart of Tulum's nature. Immerse yourself in a universe where visionary architecture, exceptional projects, and innovative lifestyles intertwine. Explore our high-end residences, luxury hotel establishments, vibrant shopping centers, elegant boutiques, gourmet restaurants, renowned museums, idyllic natural landscapes, and captivating art exhibitions. In Selvazama, the future stands, offering you an invaluable opportunity to be an active part of it.Our main commitment is to the environment and the quality of life of people.EDGE CERTIFICATIONTherefore, we present an innovative project designed to meet the highest standards of environmental quality and sustainability. As an EDGE-certified project,  is not only emblematic and functional but also efficient, friendly, and sustainable.ENERGY SAVING• Efficient inverter-type air conditioning system.• LED lighting in apartments and common areas.• Automatic control lighting in common areas.• Bioclimatic design and passive strategies: natural ventilation and solar protection.• Exterior walls and roof with insulating materials.• High-performance window system.WATER CONSUMPTION SAVING• Maximum saving sanitary appliances.• Low-maintenance gardening with native plants.• Low consumption irrigation system.• Recovery of condensate water from the air conditioning system.

title: CHARMING STUDIO FOR SALE IN TULUM, Tulum, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
RESIDENCE DESCRIPTION\rA new residence located in Tulum, meticulously created to offer you an extraordinary experience. Every aspect, from the design to the choice of premium materials, has been carefully considered to ensure that your investment is not only wonderful, but also a reflection of your high-end lifestyle.\rThis oasis boasts the largest solar array in the city and is the pioneer of the first residential wind turbine in America. In addition, Tesla innovation is present with charging stations, ensuring that your electric mobility is hassle-free. Another amenity is the water cleaning plant, a testament to our commitment to environmental preservation.\rThis state-of-the-art residential development redefines sustainable design standards and promises to become the perfect setting to fulfill your highest expectations. \r\rRESIDENCE AMENITIES\r- Fitness center\r- Spa and luxury salon\r- Swimming pools\r- Solar panels\r- Sky Bar\r- High-rise restaurant\r- Water filter system\r- 24/7 Security\r\rCHARMING STUDIO FOR SALE IN PLAYA DEL CARMEN\r\rPROPERTY DESCRIPTION\rBeautiful studio for sale of 57 m2 of construction, located on the first floor of the building, has one bedroom, a full bathroom, kitchen and a cozy living room with access to the terrace and pool. The unit offers a unique design and style; its high-end finishes add a touch of luxury, making it your ideal choice.\rThis space is ready for you to make it your own or to enjoy a relaxing summer apartment. The property gives you the opportunity to live unforgettable moments while enjoying the privacy and comfort of your own oasis in Tulum. READY FOR DELIVERY, TURN KEY.\r\rPROPERTY AMENITIES\r- Terrace\r- Swimming pool\r- Integral kitchen\r- Grill area\r- Furnished\r\rTULUM\rA paradisiacal place with beautiful beaches, surrounded by nature and vegetation, remains of an important Mayan city. \rTulum is a dynamic city that offers countless outdoor activities, gastronomy and cultural quality, with an optimal climate, the jungle enchants in every way and the warmth of the clear waters of the Caribbean Sea.\rThanks to its proximity to Cancun's international airport, it is an important source of growth and investment, as well as access to other attractive destinations such as Chichen Itza, Playa del Carmen, Cancun and Cozumel, making it a must-see for all visitors to the Riviera Maya. \rTulum is one of the fastest growing cities in the state, attracting a large number of tourists from all over the world. Therefore, owning a home in this part of the state will be the investment you make.\r\rCHARMING STUDIO FOR SALE IN PLAYA DEL CARMEN

title: Playacar fase 1, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Just steps away from the best Beach in Playa del Carmen, Mexico and only a quick walk to the famous 5th Avenue with the Night Life and Restaurants.This 4-bedroom Villa is mainly used a Vacation Rental and a great investment as the Vacation Rental market is very strong, but it could easily be used as residence for a large family.Upon entering the home, you will find on your right side a salon/library with a nice seating area, built in shelves, chess board and classy and comfortable chairs.To the left you will be surprised by the openness of the living room/dinning/kitchen area always accentuated by natural light from a great skylight above.The chef’s kitchen is completely equipped and has a nice seating area on the large granite counter and connects seamlessly with the living room area and the large dining table.From there you can walk right away to the garden/pool area which is totally private, and you all have a great time enjoying pool, jacuzzi and BBQ while feeling the nice Caribbean Breeze.Furthermore, on this level you have a large bedroom with its own bathroom and an office area, which can be used as 5th bedroom for larger groups.Downstairs you will find the second bedroom with a large walk-in closet and its own bathroom as well as the laundry area and the storage/bodega.On the upper level you enter first the games room with pool table and more and a balcony, that gives access to the private rooftop area, which offers beautiful views over the Mexican Caribbean and the different shades of blue, that you only find here.The upper floor offers 2 more bedrooms as well, including the spectacular master bedroom with extra-large and luxurious master bathroom.This villa is for sale furnished, well-built to highest standards, including marble floors and you will be able to enjoy high ROI through steady vacation rentals and annual appreciation as only very few properties in this exclusive community. are for sale and always sell fast.

open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Interior space: 72.47 m2 - 779.31 sqft
Terrace space: 13 m2 - 139.9 sqft
Total space:  85.87 m2 - 923.5 sqft 

The development features lush vegetation, multiple pools, relaxation area, bbq grills, and a gym. This unit comes fully furnished with very good quality furniture. The balcony offers a sort of wrap-around style around the living room area, giving you space to sit out there, relax and enjoy the green views. 

There are a lot of attractions in Tulum that you can enjoy with family or friends such as:

Dining & Shopping: Tulum is in the heart of it all. Shop for unique art and gifts; eat Mexican food and seafood delicacies.
Coral Reef: Tulum is unparalleled for snorkeling and scuba diving.
Xel-Há & Akumal: All-inclusive park with snorkeling, cenotes, zip lines and restaurants all in one place.
Food Truck Park: Palma Central Food Truck Park is popular with locals and tourists. Enjoy live entertainment, markets and delicious food options.
Tulum National Park: Is an eco-archaeological site situated on Mexico’s Yucatán Peninsula.
Tulum Ruins: Tulum is home to an ancient, walled Maya city perched on a cliff overlooking the Caribbean Sea.
Cenotes: Natural sinkholes created when limestone collapses into underground freshwater rivers.​

Enjoy its open design with a breakfast bar, which allows you to spend time with your loved ones while preparing their favorite dishes.\r\rKITCHEN EQUIPMENT\rFridge.\rMicrowave\rElectric grill.\rLaundry center\r\rHIGHLIGHTS OF THE CONDO\rPanoramic sea views.\rBright apartment with large windows that allow each of the most important spaces to have natural light.\rLiving room with full wall window and access to the terrace that opens to create a larger space perfect for entertaining guests or indoor-outdoor living.\rUnderground parking\rLaundry area.\r\rFINISHES\rMarble floor.\r\rLOCATION\rPrivileged location, 150 meters from the beach and Fifth Avenue, in the Italian zone, building surrounded by iconic restaurants and the best Beach Clubs, ¨Mamitas¨ and ¨Coralina¨, original design boutiques, shopping centers and more.\r13 minutes to Mamitas beach club.\r13 minutes from Fifth Avenue.\r30 minutes to the Playa del Carmen Pier.\r\rWALKING DISTANCE FROM THE BEACH\rThis apartment is located just 2 minutes walk from the beach, 150m from Encanto beach.\r\rRENT YOUR PROPERTY\rDevelopment that allows vacation rentals, and has an administration service, rent your property while you are not using it, they will take care of maintaining it and receiving guests for you, you will not lift a finger.\r\rINVESTMENT IN PRE-CONSTRUCTION\rCondo in pre-sale. Widely recommended for investment in pre-construction.\r\rIf you want more information about the apartment or learn more about the real estate market in the downtown area, contact us, it will be a pleasure to advise you on your new investment in Playa del Carmen.n.\r\rThe official price of this property is in pesos, the price in dollars is a reference. The exchange rate of the day will be used for the purchase.\r\rPrices may vary according to the progress of construction. title: Playacar: Exclusive Two Bedroom Condos for Sale in Playa del Carmen, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Welcome to a luxury project that transcends the boundaries of sophistication in Playacar, the fastest-growing and most valuable residential area in Playa del Carmen.The natural surroundings enveloping the development become an integral part of its design. Each residence seamlessly blends modern comfort with the serenity of nature, creating an environment where tranquility and luxury intertwine in an unparalleled manner.The luxury of living by the sea:Playacar, located on the shores of Playa del Carmen, stands as an exclusive paradise that harmoniously blends contemporary luxury with tropical beauty.With 320 hectares and 3 kilometers of beachfront, this gem of the Riviera Maya has carefully integrated the tropical environment, preserving untouched corners and pre-Hispanic vestiges in collaboration with the INAH (National Institute of Anthropology and History), which has identified and protected 57 archaeological sites.This multifamily development, consisting of only 45 exclusive 1 and 2-bedroom apartments, 4-bedroom townhouses, and luxury penthouses, is majestically distributed across three towers over a total area of 5480 m².Nestled in the prestigious Playacar, this residential development stands as a masterpiece of contemporary architecture, surrounded by a natural environment that harmonizes with tropical serenity.Authentic amenities:• Lobby• Two pools• Children’s playground• Paddle court• Sport club bar• Executive-Library Area• Sauna• Jacuzzi• Gym• Yoga & cardio areaInterested in learning more? Get in touch with our specialists for more details, or to schedule an appointment.

title: La Diosa, Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
This home is located at one of the highest points of Isla Mujeres, very close to the Punta Sur (South Point) of the Island and located at the end of a secured quiet dead end road.  It is shown as a newer Villa that is fully completed as a turnkey high standard property with a fabulous layout with all the right spaces.  No expense was spared in the completion, finishing, and equipping of this lovely Villa, which was built with the vision of elegance, security, privacy & sophistication.  The home features a large 1st floor Living area encompassing a Gourmet Kitchen with all newer stainless steel upgraded appliances and granite counter tops, a large open Dining area, and the spacious Living Room area has a walkout to the covered outdoor sitting/dining patio and the pool with sunning areas. “Imagine entertaining friends and family poolside”. The first floor also includes a main floor bedroom with bathroom 
The second level features three unsuits Bedrooms with walk-in showers and decorated with a "Caribbean Chic” taste. The Villa also features a 3rd level rooftop terrace offering 360 degree views including sunrise and moonrise views over the Caribbean Sea as well as Westerly Cancun views and sunset views over the Bay of Cancun. The home also offers travertine flooring throughout, air-conditioning throughout, a private parking area and has beautiful vegetation surrounding the property.
